column5: 50% off for July 4th weekend!! Plus a complimentary bottle of wine and a late checkout.   For July 23-August 2: for any booking of 5 days or more, I will take off $100!! (plus a free bottle of wine, early check in, and late checkout).   This spacious modern loft is 5 minutes from all major restaurants/bars/shopping, a 5 minute drive to Downtown Dallas, and 7 minutes to the iconic Reunion Tower (88 Walk Score!). This is the ideal condo for a business traveler or a weekend getaway to Dallas.
